scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:app && npm run test:unit:worker
scripts.test:integration: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d --wait && npm run test:int:run; docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml down -v
scripts.test:int:run: npm run test:int:app && npm run test:int:worker
scripts.test:int:app: cd app && npx vitest run --config vitest.integration.config.ts
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
